sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <record_update table="x_snc_city_app_artifacts_types"> <x_snc_city_app_artifacts_types action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <app display_value="Retail Banking">eebc42a5db7fb600c3beffa31d96197d</app> <description><![CDATA[The Retail Banking App leverages ServiceNow's core platform capabilities including the workflow engine for customer appointment assignments, REST APIs to communicate with outside services for mapping ATM and Banking Center locations, ServicePortal for a mobile consumer experience, and performance analytics and reporting for insights.]]></description> <gradient_end>#252b2f</gradient_end> <gradient_start>#768490</gradient_start> <heading>The Building Blocks</heading> <order>500</order> <short_description/> <sys_created_by>michael.ritchie</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2017-07-26 19:00:28</sys_created_on> <sys_id>ee795d04db988300d6afffb41d96197e</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>michael.ritchie</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2017-07-28 13:34:08</sys_updated_on> <type>Architecture</type> </x_snc_city_app_artifacts_types> </record_update>
